about_the_game: Celebrate the summer in style with the latest in surf fashion! Trade uniforms for bikinis and swim shorts and cool off after a hard day of studying with the Beachwear Costume Set.
detailed_description: Celebrate the summer in style with the latest in surf fashion! Trade uniforms for bikinis and swim shorts and cool off after a hard day of studying with the Beachwear Costume Set.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X4 940 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800GTS or better, AMD Radeon HD 3830
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X4 940 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
